title: Pupil progress between 11 and 16 years old (‘Progress 8’)
description: This data measures how much progress students make between 11 and 16 years old. The data covers the academic year from September 2017 to July 2018.
datasetNotes: On the landing page, click on 14. Download the data within the Contents section
notes:
The 2 CSV files look similar in dimension content and may be able to be combined into one dataset.
Source data for datasets derived from datasets on landing page https://www.gov.uk/government/statistics/revised-gcse-and-equivalent-results-in-england-2016-to-2017 After discussion with DM (LP) decided to keep original landing page and use CSV files.
